dt-option.name: i18n

type.description: This option is capable of holding all of the sub-options for languages for the DateTime picker.

dt-option.default: The default value for this property is an object containing all of the default values for the DateTime picker's options. These are the default values that DateTime uses.
dt-option.description:
As standard, no custom options will be applied to the DateTime specific language options if `i18n` is unaltered. Otherwise the related options will be applied if they are defined within this object.
This option allows direct configuration on the language options for the DateTime instance and can be different for different instances.
